headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Festive Surprise 2022’s Final Days
content:
Don’t miss your last chance to capitalize on what the holidays are all about: free gear. Complete the following and enter 2023 on the right foot, wrapped in the warm comfort only a Snowman onesie can provide:

- Take out The Gooch to receive the Gooch Mask
- Destroy all 25 Snowmen during the Festive Surprise event to receive the Snowman Outfit
- Take out your target atop Weazel Plaza to receive the WM 29 Pistol and the Season’s Greetings Finish for the Pistol Mk II
